verses.verse: Now these <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> who came <WH935> to Egypt <WH4714> with Jacob; <WH3290> they came <WH935> each <WH376> one <WH376> with his household: <WH1004>
Reuben, <WH7205> Simeon, <WH8095> Levi <WH3878> and Judah; <WH3063>
Issachar, <WH3485> Zebulun <WH2074> and Benjamin; <WH1144>
Dan <WH1835> and Naphtali, <WH5321> Gad <WH1410> and Asher. <WH836>
And all <WH3605> the persons <WH5315> who came <WH3318> from the loins <WH3409> of Jacob <WH3290> were seventy <WH7657> in number, <WH5315> but Joseph <WH3130> was [already] in Egypt. <WH4714>
And Joseph <WH3130> died, <WH4191> and all <WH3605> his brothers <WH251> and all <WH3605> that generation.

But the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were fruitful <WH6509> and increased <WH8317> greatly, <WH8317> and multiplied, <WH7235> and became <WH6105> exceedingly <WH3966> mighty, <WH6105> so that the land <WH776> was filled <WH4390> with them.
Now a new <WH2319> king <WH4428> arose <WH6965> over <WH5921> Egypt, <WH4714> who <WH834> did not know <WH3045> Joseph. <WH3130>
And he said <WH559> to his people, <WH5971> "Behold, <WH2009> the people <WH5971> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> are more <WH7227> and mightier <WH6099> than <WH4480> we.

"Come, <WH3051> let us deal <WH2449> wisely <WH2449> with them, lest <WH6435> they multiply <WH7235> and in the event <WH1961> <WH3588> <WH7122> of war, <WH4421> they also <WH1571> join <WH3254> themselves to those who <WH834> hate <WH8130> us, and fight <WH3898> against us, and depart <WH5927> from the land. <WH776>"

So they appointed <WH7760> taskmasters <WH8269> <WH4522> over <WH5921> them to afflict <WH6031> them with hard <WH5450> labor. <WH5450> And they built <WH1129> for Pharaoh <WH6547> storage <WH4543> cities, <WH5892> Pithom <WH6619> and Raamses. <WH7486>

But the more <WH9201> they afflicted <WH6031> them, the more <WH3651> they multiplied <WH7235> and the more <WH3651> they spread <WH6555> out, so that they were in dread <WH6973> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
And the Egyptians <WH4714> compelled the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to labor <WH5647> rigorously; <WH6531>

and they made <WH4843> their lives <WH9132> bitter <WH4843> with hard <WH7186> labor <WH5656> in mortar <WH2563> and bricks <WH3843> and at all <WH3605> [kinds] of labor <WH5656> in the field, <WH7704> all <WH3605> their labors <WH5656> which <WH834> they rigorously <WH6531> imposed <WH5647> on them.

Then the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> spoke <WH559> to the Hebrew <WH5680> midwives, <WH3205> one <WH259> of whom <WH834> was named <WH8034> Shiphrah, <WH8236> and the other <WH8145> was named <WH8034> Puah; <WH6326>

and he said, <WH559> "When you are helping the Hebrew <WH5680> women <WH5680> to give <WH3205> birth <WH3205> and see <WH7200> [them] upon the birthstool, <WH70> if <WH518> it is a son, <WH1121> then you shall put <WH4191> him to death; <WH4191> but if <WH518> it is a daughter, <WH1323> then she shall live. <WH2421>"
But the midwives <WH3205> feared <WH3372> God, <WH430> and did not do <WH6213> as the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> had commanded <WH1696> them, but let the boys <WH3206> live. <WH2421>

So the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> called <WH7121> for the midwives, <WH3205> and said <WH559> to them, "Why <WH4069> have you done <WH6213> this <WH2088> thing, <WH1697> and let the boys <WH3206> live <WH2421>?"

And the midwives <WH3205> said <WH559> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> "Because <WH3588> the Hebrew <WH5680> women <WH5680> are not as the Egyptian <WH4713> women; <WH802> for they are vigorous, <WH2422> and they give <WH3205> birth <WH3205> before <WH2962> the midwife <WH3205> can <WH935> get <WH935> to them."
So God <WH430> was good <WH3190> to the midwives, <WH3205> and the people <WH5971> multiplied, <WH7235> and became <WH6105> very <WH3966> mighty. <WH6105>
And it came <WH1961> about because <WH3588> the midwives <WH3205> feared <WH3372> God, <WH430> that He established <WH6213> households <WH1004> for them.

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> commanded <WH6680> all <WH3605> his people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> "Every <WH3605> son <WH1121> who is born <WH3209> you are to cast <WH7993> into the Nile, <WH2975> and every <WH3605> daughter <WH1323> you are to keep <WH2421> alive. <WH2421>"
